lines.text: Get your dumb thumb out of my eye!
I was just trying to see if you was dead.
Well, I ain't! And I don't like someone trying to gouge my eye out.
Now wait a minute, Melody. You ain't got to be no dumber than necessary.
That would make me somebody, wouldn't it?

Look Melody, you couldn't hit the hind end of your horse with a handful of buckshot and you know it. And you ain't a gunfighter, that's all. You ain't even a good shot. You're just a plain no good bronc stomper that's been hit in the seat of the pants so many times....
You always want to shoot them in their right eye. It spoils their aim.
Who is it?
That used to be Packard, the Express Company fella.
Well that cinched the duck! Now they got a corpus delicti!
A what?
A dead body! That's the way the law says it. Corpus delicti. Means that if they got a corpse, you're delicti! Before this, even if they hung ya, we could have proved it was a mistake.
when a posse makes a mistake, it's a mighty hard thing to unmake.

Pa gave me a piece of advice that ain't never failed me yet. Son, he says, if you ever fool around with a woman, always hide a dollar in the toe of your boot and you'll come out a dollar to the good. That is, Pa says, if you keep your boots on.
Who is she?
I've never seen her before.
That time in Cheyenne when you was kicked in the head and you was missing four days... are you sure you didn't marry somebody while you was out of your head?
I wasn't that far out of my head!
If there's anything in the world I like, it's gitten saved from being shot.

[Melody tells Cherry that she can't shoot; she responds with three well-placed shots]
When I aim at something, I hit it and when I hit something its what I aimed at.

[to Melody as he enters the saloon]
Don't go fur, will yuh? I don't aim to be drinkin' here for more than five or six hours.

[as he is swapping clothes with Monte]
Not even if we swapped every stich,
[Handing him the silver dollar he always keeps]
'cause there still wouldn't be no scar on my face.

[Cold-bloodedly]
But who'd know that... if there wasn't no face left?

[to Cherry, lying down on the bed]
Watcha got in this mattress... skulls?
Like I told your friend, never turn your back on anything... especially a girl!
